subject: [YouTrack, Commented] Issue codio-6420: Changing plan from Edu trial (full access) to Dev orgs should show more info about what user will buy
text:
Bug was updated by VeronikaLee in project Codio at 29 Sep 2015 07:36.
 < https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/codio-6420 >codio-6420< https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/codio-6420 > Changing plan from Edu trial (full access) to Dev orgs should show more info about what user will buy Created by VeronikaLee  
codio.com                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
* create Edu Trial org                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
* create classes                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
* change to dev org (it is very simple with no messages about no_UnitAccess)                                                                                                                                                                                    
* see you are unable to edit your classeswe need to add more details as to what plans give them edu access                                                                                                                                                      
It needs to state clearly here that edu features (classes) are not available with these plans                                                                                                                                                                   
and tell them to contact us if they want edu access                                                                                                                                                                                                             
Need more info and copy to show users                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
          need to wait for< https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/codio-6473 > https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/codio-6473 to be fixed

Refers to < https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/codio-6473 >codio-6473 Billing is broken on staging and test2 (cannot check it on production)
